CurrentIssues.ID: ForbiddenComment:DeviceAdd.kt$// TODO: Replace this by a `LoadingIndicator` once it is available/out of experimental
ForbiddenComment:DeviceInfoTwoRows.kt$// TODO: Replace those RoundedPolygon with MaterialShapes (cookies) when available
ForbiddenComment:DeviceInfoTwoRows.kt$// TODO: This row should be replaced with a ConstraintLayout or something similar.
ForbiddenComment:DeviceListDetail.kt$// TODO: Move the selectedDevice to the ViewModel
ForbiddenComment:DeviceListDetail.kt$// TODO: Move this to a utility file or somewhere else, maybe.
ForbiddenComment:DeviceUpdateService.kt$DeviceUpdateService$// TODO: Add support for Ethernet devices. Support was never fully implemented.
ForbiddenComment:ReleaseService.kt$ReleaseService$// TODO: Modify this to use repositoryOwner and repositoryName

ForbiddenComment:VersionDao.kt$* nightly tag is not supported at the moment. Exclude it from results. * TODO: Add support for nightly tags. This will need special handling since the tag itself never * changes. Probably need a new Branch option for it too.
ForbiddenComment:WebsocketClient.kt$WebsocketClient$// TODO: Extract the user agent to a constant somewhere to avoid magic string.
